# Nowe Warpno Bay

Nowe Warpno Bay (Polish: Zatoka Nowowarpieńska) – a bay located in the southern part of the Szczecin Lagoon. The bay separates the land of the . The southern waters of the bay are linked with the Nowe Warpno Lake. From the north, the bay is separated from the Szczecin Lagoon by the  and the . Between the lake and the lagoon is located the , on which the town of Nowe Warpno is located with the . On the north-western coast of the bay is located the village of Altwarp ().
